enhanced_description: Mercu is an AI-powered recruitment automation platform and communication software specifically designed for the frontline and deskless workforce. It enables employers to communicate effectively across hiring, training, announcements, and engagement through familiar chat apps like WhatsApp and iMessage, eliminating the need for email, login, or new app downloads, thus ensuring a frictionless experience. Mercu streamlines high-volume hiring processes by offering fast, automated solutions like AI-powered screening to confidently shortlist candidates without manual sorting, and automated interview scheduling, which has been shown to reduce no-shows by 30%. Beyond hiring, Mercu scales onboarding, makes knowledge and tools instantly available, and supports skill development and engagement for improved employee happiness. Its smart workflow capabilities allow it to adapt to existing organizational processes.
